name: Twilreapi
description: An Open Source implementation of Twillo's REST API

scripts.postdeploy: bundle exec rake db:schema:load && bundle exec rake db:seed

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: The number of processes to run.

ACTIVE_JOB_QUEUE_ADAPTER.description: The queue adapter to use with ActiveJob. If no job adapter is specified it will default to ActiveJob's default queue

ACTIVE_JOB_SIDEKIQ_OUTBOUND_CALL_WORKER_.description: The name of the sidekiq worker class for enqueuing outbound calls. This class needs to be the same as defined in your Sidekiq worker dyno. Only applicable if your using Sidekiq.
The name of the sidekiq queue to enqueue outbound calls. If not specified it will default to 'default'. Only applicable if your using Sidekiq

SIDEKIQ_WEB_HTTP_BASIC_USERNAME.description: The HTTP Basic username for authentication for Sidekiq's Web Interface. Only applicable if your using Sidekiq

SIDEKIQ_WEB_HTTP_BASIC_PASSWORD.description: The HTTP Basic password for authentication for Sidekiq's Web Interface. Only applicable if your using Sidekiq

FORCE_SSL.description: Set to 1 to force SSL. Defaults to 0.
